about_the_game:
The Labyrinthine Supporter edition is an excellent way to support the development of future Labyrinthine content and new Valko projects whilst also receiving exclusive cosmetic benefits.

The following items are included:

Extra Glowstick Colours



Some would argue glowsticks are the heart of labyrinthine, whether you use them to navigate the mazes, create pieces of art or simply throw them at friends. With this edition of Labyrinthine, you get access to an extra 3 colours; Cyan, Purple and Yellow. These new colours are additional to the existing colours, work with custom glowsticks and can be seen by non-supporter players!

Exclusive Cosmetics



Customise your character further with supporter-exclusive cosmetics;
  • Googly Eyes which move with you
  • A Cyberpunk visor which pulsates and lights up as you talk in game
  • A Tuxedo tshirt to make you look extra dapper
  • Black / Pink punk rock wrist bands

Unique Nameplate



Stand out in the lobby with a unique orange coloured nameplate, available only to supporters.

Two Exclusive Lobby Music Tracks



Customise your lobby further with two exclusive music tracks; "Blood of Midnight" and "Darling Caravella".

name: Labyrinthine Supporter Edition
short_description: A fully cosmetic addon that includes new glowstick colours, new cosmetics, new music tracks and a unique lobby nameplate.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Dutch*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Italian*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
